original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, postHistory as ph, votes as v, users as u WHERE u.Id = v.UserId AND v.UserId = ph.UserId AND ph.UserId =c.UserId AND c.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-08-12 20:33:46' AS TIMESTAMP) AND c.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-13 19:26:55' AS TIMESTAMP) AND ph.CreationDate>=CAST('2011-04-11 14:46:09' AS TIMESTAMP) AND ph.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-08-17 16:37:23' AS TIMESTAMP) AND v.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-26 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND v.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-12 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.Views>=0 AND u.Views<=783 AND u.DownVotes>=0 AND u.DownVotes<=1 AND u.UpVotes<=123
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE CAST(comments.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-08-12 20:33:46' AND CAST(comments.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-13 19:26:55'

CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE CAST(votes.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-26 00:00:00' AND CAST(votes.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-12 00:00:00'

CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE CAST(users.Views AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(users.Views AS INTEGER) <= 783 AND (CAST(users.DownVotes AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(users.DownVotes AS INTEGER) <= 1) AND users.UpVotes <= 123
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3E4 AS SELECT * FROM E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E3.UserId=E4.Id)

CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE CAST(postHistory.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2011-04-11 14:46:09' AND CAST(postHistory.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-08-17 16:37:23'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3E4E2 AS SELECT * FROM E3E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E3E4.UserId=E2.UserId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E4E2 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3E4E2 WHERE E1.UserId=E3E4E2.UserId)
